ygData.subject: Re: OOC about CF
ygData.msgSnippet: Comparing the attack on the Iron Fist with the attack on the Cybertronian Fire is not a good idea. Five bots attacked the Iron Fist and didn t put on a

Comparing the attack on the Iron Fist with the attack on the 
Cybertronian Fire is not a good idea. Five bots attacked the Iron 
Fist and didn't put on a scratch, but over 30 bots attacked the CF. 
Its reasonable that they would do better.

And you've only been in the RPG for a fraction of the time it was 
going. The Alliance had had many defeats before, but less than the 
other factions because they don't have as much direct fighting. If 
the Trainers would have attacked with over 30 bots, there would be no 
doubt that the Alliance base would be either theirs or destroyed 
right now (more likely destroyed).

Now, about Unitron and Firestarter: The hull was breached after the 
lockdown by Oblitertron, and the hole happened to lead into the 
bridge. Unitron and Firestarter entered that hole before Hysteria had 
a chance to put a lockdown on the bridge and cover the hole with 
blast panels. She did that, however, and the hole is no longer an 
entrance. Unitron and Firestarter cleared the internal autoguns in 
the bridge, which wasn't a hard task due to all the damage in the 
bridge, the bridge lockdown, and the lack of power that the CF is 
experiencing. Vehement also helped them.

Instead of complaining about the Alliance winning, people should be 
improving the Maximals. I'm as sick of this battle as everyone else, 
and I was leaving the Maximals alone, but (no offence), you decided 
to attack and continue the battle. So don't complain and do RP, 
because you brought this upon yourself.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Jason  lind" <icedemon101@h...> wrote:
> [ok I have a couple things to say. you all keep saying the ship is 
on 
> lockdown right then how the hell is Unitron and firestarter are 
> inside.also if they are inside wouldn't the defense grid inside the 
> CF would come online. also from the shields and autoguns outside 
> would not be destroyed so easily. also no matter what the alliance 
do 
> they always get there way. How is that? I am not the only one 
> thinking this. when the Ironfist was attacked not even a scrath was 
> left on it. but when the alliance attacks everything gets blown up. 
> whats up with that?]
